name: George Heaton
background_summary: George Heaton is the co-founder, Owner, and Creative Director of Represent, a brand he has built over the past 13 years. His academic background is in Graphic Design, holding a BA Hons from The University of Salford. This design expertise likely underpins his role as Creative Director. Having led Represent since its inception, Heaton demonstrates significant entrepreneurial experience and long-term commitment to building a brand from the ground up.

previous_companies.description: Co-founded and led the growth of Represent, a luxury streetwear brand, over the past 13+ years.
